subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena and Venus Williams were the lone remaining United States women at the Sony Ericsson Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., with the second round not yet complete. Top-ranked Serena Williams reached the third round by winning, 6-2, 6-3, against the 19-year-old Californian Alexa Glatch. No. 5-seeded Venus Williams also won her opening match, beating Shahar Peer, 6-3, 6-3.
